tasks.text: Must attend a daily meeting every morning at 11:00.
The daily standup meeting must not be longer than 15-20 minutes. We must use a stopwatch to limit every members update.

This card does not have any memebers assigned to it :(
Should we add some members here?
Maybe Darth Vader or some other cool guy?
